actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require an adjustment in DRG-related prospective payment rates to hospitals to take into account the relative severity of illness involved.

summary.text: Amends title XVIII (Medicare) of the Social Security Act to require an adjustment in rates of prospective payment to hospitals which takes into account the relative severity of illness associated with discharges within a diagnosis-related group.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XVIII of the Social Security Act to require an adjustment in DRG-related prospective payment rates to hospitals to take into account the relative severity of illness involved.
